p: Hence, the aim of this study was to assess for the first time whether TTO in association with ITZ or KTZ improves the antifungal activity of these azoles against T. rubrum. In this perspective, our findings highlight the synergistic interaction of TTO with ITZ or KTZ against a T. rubrum clinical strain. TTO also reduced the MIC of ITZ and KTZ up to 8-fold (from 0.5 to 0.06 µg/mL and 0.25 to 0.03 µg/mL, respectively). Moreover, another remarkable result is that the TTO MIC decreased in combination with azoles (0.135/0.27 mg/mL vs. 1.08 mg/mL) up to 8- and 4-fold ( Table 2 and Table 3).
